title: DUB Package Description Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating DUB package description files.

$schema.description: The JSON schema to use for validation

name.description: Name of the package, used to uniquely identify the package. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/package_settings/#name

license.description: License(s) under which the project can be used. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/package_settings/#license

toolchainRequirements.description: The package can specify version requirements for the toolchain. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/package_settings/#toolchainrequirements

subPackages.description: Defines an array of sub-packages defined in the same directory as the root project. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/package_settings/#subpackages

configurations.description: Speficies an optional list of build configurations. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/package_settings/#configurations

buildTypes.description: Defines additional custom build types or overrides the default ones. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/package_settings/#buildtypes

x:ddoxFilterArgs.description: Specifies a list of command line flags usable for controlling filter behavior for --build=ddox [experimental]. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/package_settings/#xddoxfilterargs

systemDependencies.description: A textual description of the required system dependencies (external C libraries) required by the package. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#systemdependencies

targetName.description: Sets the base name of the output file. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#targetname

targetPath.description: The destination path of the output binary. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#targetpath

workingDirectory.description: A fixed working directory from which the generated executable will be run. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#workingdirectory

subConfigurations.description: Locks the dependencies to specific configurations. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#subconfigurations

^:?([a-z]+(?:[-_\/][a-z]+)*)$.description: Map from package name to configuration name.

buildRequirements.description: List of required settings for the build process. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#buildrequirements

frameworks.description: A list of external framework names - Used only for darwin platforms. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#frameworks

sourceFiles.description: Additional files passed to the compiler. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#sourcefiles

sourcePaths.description: Allows to customize the path where to look for source files. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#sourcepaths

excludedSourceFiles.description: Files that should be removed for the set of already added source files (takes precedence over "sourceFiles" and "sourcePaths"). https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#excludedsourcefiles

mainSourceFile.description: Determines the file that contains the main() function. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#mainSourceFile

extraDependencyFiles.description: A list of globs matching files to be checked for rebuilding the dub project. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#extradependencyfiles

versions.description: A list of D's custom conditional compilation versions to be defined during compilation. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#versions

debugVersions.description: A list of D's custom debug condition identifiers to be defined during compilation. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#debugversions

importPaths.description: Additional import paths to search for D modules. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#importpaths

stringImportPaths.description: Additional import paths to search for string imports. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#stringimportpaths

cImportPaths.description: Additional import paths to search for C files. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#cimportpaths

preGenerateCommands.description: A list of shell commands that is always executed before project generation is started. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#pregeneratecommands

postGenerateCommands.description: A list of shell commands that is always executed after project generation is finished. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#postgeneratecommands

preBuildCommands.description: A list of shell commands that is executed before the package is built. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#prebuildcommands

postBuildCommands.description: A list of shell commands that is executed after the package is built. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#postbuildcommands

preRunCommands.description: A list of shell commands that is executed always before the project is run. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#preruncommands

postRunCommands.description: A list of shell commands that is executed always after the project is run. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#postruncommands

lflags.description: Additional flags passed to the linker. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#lflags

injectSourceFiles.description: Source files that will be compiled into binaries that depend on this package, no matter what targetType the package has. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#injectsourcefiles

^libs(-(?:windows|win32|win64|linux|appl.description: A list of external library names. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#libs

^copyFiles(-(?:windows|win32|win64|linux.description: A list of globs matching files or directories to be copied to targetPath. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#copyfiles

^dflags(-(?:dmd|gnu|ldc|sdc))?$.description: Additional flags passed to the D compiler. https://dub.pm/dub-reference/build_settings/#dflags

versionSpec.description: Version specifiers define a range of acceptable versions. (e.g., '~>1.2.0', '>=1.0.0'). https://dub.pm/dub-reference/dependencies/

dependencyObject.description: A dependency version specification can either be a simple string for the version or a more complex variant.

path.description: Use a folder to source a package from. References a package in a specific path.

repository.description: Clone a git repository as dependency. (e.g., 'git+https://...').

version.description: The version specification as used for the simple form.

default.description: Choose an optional dependency by default.

commandArray.description: An array of shell commands to execute.
